Tikal is a game of exploration within the Central American jungles in search of lost temples and the treasures within. Players send their team of explorers into the jungle, exposing more and more of the terrain.  Along the way, you find temples that require further uncovering and treasures.  Players attempt to score points for occupying temples and holding onto treasure.<br/><br/>Tikal is the first game of the Mask Trilogy.<br/><br/>Sequel:<br/><br/>     Tikal II: The Los...
